TopicTitle: Why do my rover controls keep inverting?

Articles.Content:
I've made a few different rover designs. Before attempting to even figure out how to get them to where they are going I have been testing them on kerbin.

Now on Kerbin everything works just fine. I goes forward, K back, L right, J left. However every single one of these rovers, even when no change has been made to them other than the skycrane added when they get to Mun, Minmus, Eve, or Laythe the controls are reversed. Back is now forward and so on.

And that is supposed to be unanswered but I don't know how to change it

Make sure that when you click the rover wheels it says 'invert rover wheels' because that means that they are normal. Check the orientation of the probe/capsule being used to control the rover, it may be placed incorrectly. Also, I believe you can edit your title by editing the original post.
